---
order: 3
---

# status

查询远程节点的状态
```shell script
bhpcli status [flags]
```

示例
```shell script
bhpcli status
```
响应
```shell script
{
	"jsonrpc": "2.0",
	"id": 1,
	"result": {
		"blockHash": "0x29165096a0f846845323c148d3864108587b22aae88aa53614f481f7c2642058",
		"blockNumber": "0x73",
		"contractAddress": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
		"cumulativeGasUsed": null,
		"from": "0x39a86a5c6ed3b8860ebc7437d53518ec2ad5a2c7",
		"gasUsed": "0x7ee",
		"logs": [],
		"logsBloom": "",
		"status": "0x1",
		"to": "0xe17281c17443b90a145d1a103d57189ffb2d912f",
		"transactionHash": "0x2333cf05a216e2c311c4787e9d713cfc68390e10a8fa40d3a36726b8c55113e6",
		"transactionIndex": "0x0"
	}
}
```
